{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Wireless Portable Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.hootoo.com/hootoo-tripmate-elite-ht-tm04-wireless-portable-router.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = HooToo |model = TripMate |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Elite |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = HT-TM04 |page_start_date = 02/20/2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/HooToo_TripMate_Elite |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = travel router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT5350F; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 360 <!-- 360 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1C:C2 |oui = 00:1C:C2
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;3.6.0.0;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.21;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_vac = 120 |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_conn = AC (direct)
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = USB charging port, battery powered, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 10.10.10.254 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = TripMateElite-CEDE |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2015 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 100 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00UFLP86U |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B012ZNMUL6 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''HooToo TripMate Elite Travel Wireless Router'' - Mini Travel Router :6000mAh External Battery Pack, Dual USB Port, AC Charger :Wi-Fi Media Sharing for Flash Drive & Hard Disk Storage.
==Links of Interest== *[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/hootoo/tripmate-nano ''HooToo TripMate'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
